page.title: 20CONCLUSION TO QUERNMORE
page.content: Our school is not quite in our 12sq km area but we look out over it at Clougha and the fields and moors.We think we are very lucky to live and work in such a lovely area.We hope people will enjoy reading about it as much as we've enjoyed writing about it. The people who have contributed to this project from Quernmore Primary Junior 4 class are: Duncan Bird, Richard Brigg, Sally Dearden, Naomi Devlin, Kenneth Drinkwater, Bron Fegan, Katy Flude, Natasha Fogg, Simon Hall, Beni Hammond, Irenee Horne, Aneirin Jellicoe, Jo Johnson, Sarah Kidd, Richard Mitchell, Dzulfiqa Mustapha, Jenny Shepherd, Ben Short, Chris Staunton, Amy Urry, Tracy Whitaker, Daniel Wittering. Head teacher Miss Audrey Mitton.
